sectiondef.header: Constructors, destructors, reset and class name methods

description.para: Reset method resets all attribute classes

briefdescription.para: Reset the object, that is 1) removing all childs and 2) resetting all attributes.

detaileddescription.para: The method is virtual, so always call the parent in the method overriding it.

sectiondef.header: Set and Get the non-justifiable margin (right and left scoreDefs)
Set and Get the initial tstamp duration.

description.para: Setter takes a meter unit parameter.

briefdescription.para: A pointer to the left and right Alignment object kept for the measure start and end position.
A pointer to the left and right Alignment object kept for the left and right barline position.
Store measure's non-justifiable margin used by the scoreDef attributes.
The time duration of the timestamp between 0.0 and 1.0.

detaileddescription.para: This depends on the meter signature in the preceeding scoreDef

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the alignmnet of the type at that time.

detaileddescription.para: The alignment object is added if not found. The maximum time position is also adjusted accordingly for end barline positioning

briefdescription.para: Keep the maximum time of the measure.

detaileddescription.para: This corresponds to the whole duration of the measure and should be the same for all staves/layers.

briefdescription.para: Return the max time of the measure (i.e., the right measure alignment time)
Get left Alignment for the measure and for the left BarLine.

detaileddescription.para: For each MeasureAligner, we keep and Alignment for the left position. The Alignment time will be always -1.0 * DUR_MAX and will appear first in the list.

briefdescription.para: Get right Alignment for the measure.

detaileddescription.para: For each MeasureAligner, we keep and Alignment for the right position. The Alignment time will be increased whenever necessary when values are added.

briefdescription.para: Adjust the spacing of the measure looking at each tuple of start / end alignment and a distance.

detaileddescription.para: The distance is an expansion value (positive) of compression (negative). Called from Measure::AdjustSylSpacingEnd.

briefdescription.para: Push all the ALIGNMENT_GRACENOTE and ALIGNMENT_CONTAINER to the right.

detaileddescription.para: This is necessary to make sure they align with the next alignment content.

briefdescription.para: Adjust the spacing for the grace note group(s) of the alignment on staffN The alignment need to be of ALIGNMENT_GRACENOTE type.
Set the position of the Alignment.

detaileddescription.para: Looks at the time different with the previous Alignment. For each MeasureAlignment, we need to reset the previous time position.

briefdescription.para: Justify the X positions Special case of functor redirected from Measure.
This class aligns the content of a measure It contains a vector of Alignment.
